.
Partograph
Th e partograph is a graphic recording of the progress of labour and the condition of the 
mother and foetus. It is a tool which helps assess the need for action and recognises the need 
for referral at the appropriate time. Th is facilitates timely referral to save the life of the mother 
and foetus.
Follow the instructions below carefully while fi lling the partograph:
Identifi cation data –Note down the woman’s name and age, parity, date and time of 
admission, registration numbe
